answers.answer: Sometimes it shows in ur pee!  But I'd wait for the blood work! It's ok don't stress.......think positive!

Ive had this twice at my appointments staight after each other my blood work came back fine glucose tt then went for my next midwife appointment and sugur was in urine again so had to have another glucose tt and a diabetes fasting test and yet again nothing im now 33 weeks pregnant and all going well im on antibiotics for some kind of infection but thats normal sometimes you will have sugar in your urine if your bloods come back ok try to cut down on your sugar intakes this helped me :-)
Thanks!! I think I do need to cut down on my sugar intakes!! And sire I will thanks!!

question: I'm 16 weeks pregnant and I'm at my appt, I was just told that glucose was found in my urine! What does it mean?? Could it be because this morning I had cereal for breakfast?? Im scared to have gd! They have me here waiting to do the glucose test
title: glucose in urine???
